name: Tasawr Interactive
overview:
Tasawr Interactive have a passion for making beautiful designs. Tasawr Interactive loves designing beautiful applications that work intuitively. In other words, we design interfaces that you love to use and even love to look at. It is this shared passion that has brought us together at Tasawr, to help rejuvenate the GCC design industry.

they are a multi-disciplinary team of strategists, designers, developers and analysts, with vast domain experience and expertise in providing solutions and services for organizations such as the Saudi Ministry of Interior, Ministry of Transportation, Zain Telecommunications, and many others.

To get a better idea of what we do, and what we can do for you, please check out our portfolio of current work.
